statements: SELECT * FROM GameTransactions;
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount, currency_type FROM GameTransactions WHERE purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_timestamp FROM GameTransactions WHERE currency_type = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM GameTransactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM GameTransactions;
SELECT * FROM GameTransactions WHERE player_id = 'f1b711a6-140f-4c15-8ebd-355cc3929c9d'
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, purchase_timestamp FROM GameTransactions WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC
SELECT player_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM GameTransactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY average_amount DESC

SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM GameTransactions WHERE currency_type = 'USD' GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT player_id, MAX(purchase_timestamp) AS latest_purchase FROM GameTransactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY latest_purchase DESC
SELECT * FROM game_purchases
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount FROM game_purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM game_purchases WHERE player_id = 1003
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchases FROM game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchases > 1000
SELECT * FROM game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM game_purchases WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_transactions < 5
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT purchase_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM in_game_purchases WHERE item_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, analysis_date, revenue FROM monetization_analysis WHERE revenue > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchased' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM monetization_analysis GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT user_id, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, purchases.purchase_amount, items.item_name FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id JOIN items ON purchases.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(purchase_id) > 3;
SELECT users.username, MAX(purchases.purchase_amount) AS max_purchase FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT items.item_name, SUM(purchases.purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM items JOIN purchases ON items.item_id = purchases.item_id GROUP BY items.item_name HAVING SUM(purchases.purchase_amount) > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT player_id, username FROM players ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, currency_amount FROM virtual_currency WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_id, item_name, price FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 5 AND item_name LIKE 'Sword%' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT p.id, p.item_name, p.price, pl.username FROM purchases p JOIN players pl ON p.player_id = pl.id WHERE p.purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY p.price DESC
SELECT pl.username, vc.currency_amount FROM players pl LEFT JOIN virtual_currency vc ON pl.id = vc.player_id WHERE vc.currency_amount > 1000
SELECT t.player_id, t.transaction_type, t.amount, a.analysis_result FROM transactions t JOIN analysis a ON t.player_id = a.player_id WHERE t.amount < 0.00 AND a.analysis_date = '2022-03-15'
